name: Imperivm II
description:
Imperium II: The Conquest of Hispania is a strategy video game for PC produced by FX Interactive, based on historical events in Europe and North Africa. Specifically, the player can relive the conquests of Hannibal, the site of Numancia or the course of the Punic wars, with battles as important as the conquest of Gades, the battle of Cannae or the invasion of Sicily. In addition, the player can take command of armies of four important ancient civilizations: Iberians, Roman Carthaginians and Gauls.

It is important to add that this game is not only based on historical events and battles, but also has been deeply inspired by archaeological sites, ceramics, burials, etc. to perform both structures and units.
